Vaaran English.translation: One Oankar,the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

Vaaran English.translation: Bowing at the feet of the true Guru, they shed their sense of ego.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (auh Awp nUM) siqgur dI crnIˆ fygky Awpw Bwv guAw dyˆdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: As disciples, they please the Guru and the heart of the Gum becomes happy.

Vaaran English.translation: The gurmukh realises the imperceptible Lord spontaneously.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (Pyr is`K) gurU duAwrw sihj suBwv hI AlK nUM lK lYˆdw hY[

lines.transliteration_english: gurasikh til na tamaae, kaar kamaavaNaa |

Vaaran English.translation: The Sikh of Guru has no greed at all and he earns his livelihood by the labour of his hands.

Vaaran English.translation: Merging his consciousness into the word he obeys the commands of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: vIh iekIh lMGwie, inj Gir jwvxw [
lines.transliteration_english: veeh eikeeh langhaae, nij ghar jaavaNaa |

Vaaran English.translation: Crossing beyond the worldly illusions he abides in his own real self.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (auh) vIh (rjo, qmo, dIAW qwrIAw-pOVIAW) lMG ky iekIh (sqo qoˆ A`gy) jwky sÍYsrUp ivc phuMcdy hn[

lines.transliteration_english: guramukh sukh fal paae, sahaj samaavaNaa ||11||

Vaaran English.translation: This way, the gurmukhs having attained the pleasure fruit absorb themselves in equipoise.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (AYauˆ) gurmuK (hoky) suK Pl pwky sihj ivc smwauˆdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurmukhs knew very well about the one Guru (Nanak) and one disciple (Guru Angad).

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: iek gurU (nwnk gurU hn, ArQwq iSromxI gurU hn, iqhw hI) iek isK (gurU AMgd hY, ies Byq nUM pUrn AvsQw gur isKI dI ienHW ivc GtI hY) gurmuK lokW jwixAw hY[

lines.transliteration_english: gur chelaa gur sikh, sach samaaNiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: By becoming the true Sikh of the Guru, this disciple virtually merged himself into the latter.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gur cylw (kho) Bwvyˆ gur isK (kho Bwv iek rUp hoky) s`c ivKy smw gey hn[

Vaaran English.translation: The true Guru and the disciple were identical (in spirit) and their Word was also one.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: soeI 'siqgur' (gurU nwnk) soeI isK (AMgd jI) Sbd(rUp dy) vKwx kIqy gey hn[

Vaaran English.translation: This is the wonder of the past and the future that they (both) loved the truth.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (Acrj rUp) BUq (kwl ivc sI aunHW dw Aqy) Biv`Kq (ivc BI) Acrj rUp hY, s`c (dohW nUM iqMnW kwlW ivKy) pÎwrw lgw hY (Bwv kdy nwsI nhIˆ hn)[

Vaaran English.translation: They were beyond all accounts and were honour of the humble ones.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: lyKy Qoˆ AlyK hn, inmwixAW dy mwx AlyK hn, (AQvw inmwixAW dy mwx Ail`K hn ik ilKq ivKy nhIˆ Aw skdy)[

lines.transliteration_english: samasar anmrit vikh, na aavaN jaaNiaa |

Vaaran English.translation: For them, the nectar and poison were the same and they had got liberated from the cycle of transmigration

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (aunHW nUM) AMimRq Aqy ivK brwbr hY; Awvwgvn ivK nhIˆ hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Recorded as the model of special virtues, they are known as the extremely honourable ones.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (jo) pRgt hoky (hrI dw js) ilKdy (ArQwq Dwrn krdy hn auh 'hd nIswixAw' khIey) Aiq pRgt ho jWdy hn (Bwv cwr kuMtW ivKy ivdq huMdy hn)[

lines.transliteration_english: gur sikhahu gur sikh, hoe hairaaNiaa ||12||

Vaaran English.translation: The wonderful fact is that the sikh of the Guru became the Guru.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: isK Qoˆ gurU dw rUp bx jwxw (vyKky) gurU is`K hYrwn ho gey[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurmukhs drink the unbearable Cup of love filled to the brims and being in the presence of the all;

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: pRym rUpI AMimRq dw ipAwlw lbwlb (ijnHW ny) pIqw hY,

Vaaran English.translation: Pervading Lord they perceive the imperceptible.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Eh hr jgh mOjUd Kudw dy 'mihrm' ho gey hn Ar AlK nUM lK gey hn[

Vaaran English.translation: The one who resides in all hearts is dwelling in their hearts.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (jwxdy hn) ik GtW qy AvGtW ivKy pUrn hoky irdy ivKy smwie irhw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The love creeper of their's has become full of fruits as the seedling of grape turns out to be fruitful vine.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ijnHW dy irdy dy ivKy gurU Sbd) bIj dw AMgUr inkldw hY auhnUM 'sPl' (khIey gÎwn vYrwg dy) Pl lgdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Becoming sandal, they provide coolness to one and all.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (auh) bwvn cMdn vWgUM sIql hoky DrqI nUM sugMiDq krdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Their cool is like the coolness of sandal, moon, and camphor.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: cMdn, cMdRRmW, qy kpUr (ieh iqMn sIql hn pRMqU) ('n myl imlwvxw') aunHW dI brobrI nhIˆ krdy[

Vaaran English.translation: Associating the sun (rajas) with the moon (sattv) they assuage its heat.

lines.transliteration_english: charaN kaval dhee dhoor, masatak laavaNaa |

Vaaran English.translation: They put on their forehead the dust of the lotus feet

Vaaran English.translation: And come to know the creator as the root cause of all the causes.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (9) (ikauˆ jo) l`KW AMgUrW dw kwrx ho ky kwrj krdI hY (ikauˆ jo DUVI, im`tI bwJ bIj dw au`gxw AsMBv hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: When flame (of knowledge) flashes in their heart, the unstruck melody starts ringing.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (10) v`j pYˆdy hn Anwhd vwjy (qy) jwg pYˆdI hY joiq (pÎwry dI)[

Vaaran English.translation: The power of the one vibration of the Lord transcends all limits.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: iek vwkÎ qolx qoˆ bwhrw hY (iqvyˆ hI) kudrq (nUM bI) Aqol hI jwxIeyˆ (jo aus qoˆ bxI hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: The wonder and power of Oankft is indescribable.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ies dw kwrk) 'EAMkwr' hY, bcn Qoˆ bwhrw hY, (ausdy) coj Acrj rUp hn, (Eh kI hn?)

Vaaran English.translation: It is with His support that millions of rivers carrying life water go on flowing.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: l`KW drIAw AMimRq pwxI ilAwauˆdy hn[ (Bwv keI l`KW gurU dy isK nwm rUp AcMcl jl AMimRq nwl Bry hoey hn)[

Vaaran English.translation: In His creation, the gurmukhs are known as invaluable diamonds and rubies

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Amolk hIry lwl rUp bI gurU dy isK hn, (Eh ikhy hn?)

Vaaran English.translation: And they remain steadfast in gurmati and are accepted with honour in the court of the Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU dI isKÎw lY ky (mn bwxI krky) Ac`l qy Afol ho rhy hn (iesy kr ky aunHW dI) pq pRvwx peI hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The path of the gurmukhs is straight and clear and they reflect the truth.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuKW dw mwrg inrol (kwmwidk corW dy rOly Qoˆ rihq) hY, sc suhxw lgdw hY (AYsw pMQ hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: Myriad poets desire to know the mystery of His Word.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: kvI (sweIˆ lok) l`KW hI FUMfy (pr) Sbd dI nIswxI (vwly pUrn huMdy hn; jo ivrly hn)[

lines.transliteration_english: charaN kaval raj ghol, anmrit vaaNeeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: The gurmukhs have quaffed the dust of the feet of Gum like amrit.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: aunHW dy crn kvlW dI DUVI GolI hoeI AMimRq vrgI hY[

Vaaran English.translation: This tale is also ineffable.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (9) gurmuKW ny (ies nUM) r`j ky pIqw hY, (iesdI) kQw Ak`Q hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kwdru no kurbwxu, kIm n jwxIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: kaadhar no kurabaaN, keem na jaaNeeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: I am sacrifice unto that creator whose value cannot be estimated.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (prpMc dy) krqw qoˆ kurbwx (jWdy hW ijsdI) kImq nhIˆ pweI jWdI[

Vaaran English.translation: How could anybody tell how old is He?

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: kyfIku v`fI aus dI aumr AwKky vKwxIey (“kyvfu vfw fITw hoie”)[

Vaaran English.translation: What could I tell about the powers of theLord who enhances the honour of the humble ones.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: ik`fwku aus dw bl d`sIey (hW, ieh d`sdy hW ik auh) inmwixAW dw mwx hY[

lines.gurmukhi: lK ijmI Asmwxu, iqlu n qulwxIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: lakh jimee asamaaN, til na tulaaNeeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: Myriads of earths and skies are not equal to an iota of His.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: l`KW DrqI AkwS ausdy iek iql dy qol dy smwn nhIˆ hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Millions of universes are wonderstruck to see His power.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: kudrq (rcnw) ivc l`KW jhwn hn, (ijnHW nUM vyK ky) hYrwn rih jweIdw ey

Vaaran English.translation: He is king of the kings and His ordinance is obvious.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (auh krqw) sulqwnW dw sulqwn hY, hukm (ausdw) pRgt hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Millions of oceans subsume in His one drop.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: l`KW smuMdRR Aqy ndIAW aus dy iek bUMd dy swmwn hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Explanations and elaborations pertaining to Him are incomplete (and fake) because His story is ineffable.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ijhVy AwKx BeI AYfw hY) aunHW dy kQn kUVy vKÎwn hn, (ikauˆik aus dI) khwxI Ak`Q hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurmukhs know well how to move according to the command, hukam of the Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuKW ny jwixAW hY ik rjweI (vwihgurU) dy hukm ivc c`lxw hY (AQvw c`lxw hI gurmuKW ny jwixAw hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurmukh has ordained that community (panth), who moves in the will of Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuKW ny (eyho) pMQ qoirAw hY (ik vwihgurU dy) Bwxy ivKy c`lxw (hI sRySt hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: Becoming contented and true to faith they gratefully thank the Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Brosw Aqy sMqoK nUM pwky prmwqmW dw DMnvwd krnw (hI sRySt hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurmukhs perceive His wondrous sport.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: AYauˆ gurmuK prmwqmW nUM lK lYˆdy hn; (ieh) v`fw Ascrj kOqk hY (ik iPr bI)

Vaaran English.translation: They behave innocently like children and eulogize the primaeval Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: bwlkW vq suBwv rKdy hn (ieh) Awd Qoˆ vKwx kIqw hY (Bwv aunHW dw jmWdrU suBwau hY, inrmwn bwl vq rihMdy hn, AQvw hrK sog qoˆ AqIq hn[

Vaaran English.translation: They merge their consciousness in the holy congregation and truth do they love.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: swD sMgq ivKy 'ilv' (pRIq) lweI rKdy hn, qy s`c aunHW nUM suhwauˆdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Identifying the word they get liberated and

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: jIvn mukq hoky sbd bRhm nUM hI swry pCwxdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Loosing their sense of ego they perceive their inner selves.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Awpw Bwv gvwky Awpxw Awp gurmuKW ny pCwx ilAw hY, (Ar s`c aUUnHW nUM suhwauˆdw hY, s`c kih qW bQyry lYˆdy hn, pr s`c suxky suhwvxw gurmuKW nUM hI lgdw hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: The dynamism of the Guru is unmanifest and unfathomable.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Aibgq Aqy AQwh gqI kihky vKwxIdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: ghir gMBIr AQwh, hwiQ n AwxIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: gahar ganbheer athaeh, haath na aaNeeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: It is so deep and sublime that its extent cannot be known.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: fUMGI qy gMBIr hY, hwQ iksy nhIˆ pwieAw[

Vaaran English.translation: As from each drop become many tumultuous rivulets,

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: iek bUMd Qoˆ l`KW prvwh qy hVHW vwly mhW nd bxdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Likewise the ever-growing glory of gurmukhs becomes ineffable.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ies leI) gurmuKW dI isPq SlwGw dI Ak`Q khwxI hY[

Vaaran English.translation: His shores near and far cannot be known and He is adorned in infinite ways.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: aunHW dy rwh dw pwrwvwr nhIˆ, ibAMq hY Aqy suBwiemwn hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The comings and goings cease after entering the court of the Lord i.e. one becomes liberated from the bondage of transmigration.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: drgwh' (swD sMgq) byprvwh Awvx jwx qoˆ rihq hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The true Guru is totally carefree yet He is the power of the powerless ones.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: vfw byprvwh hY, inqwixAW nUM qwx idMdw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Blessed is the true Guru, seeing whom all feel wonderstruck

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (Aijhy) s`cy siqgurU DMn hn (vfy vfy lok) hYrwx huMdy hn (ik siqgurU v`fy idAwlU qy inqwixAW dI klÎwx hwry hn)[

Vaaran English.translation: Holy congregation is the abode of truth where gurmukhs go to reside.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: swD sMgq s`cw KMf hY (auQy) gurmuK lok jWdy hn (auQy jwky kI krdy hn?)[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurmukhs adore the grand and powerful true name (of the Lord).

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuK (auQy) vwihgurU dw s`cw nwm jpdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: There skillfully they enhance their inner flame (of knowledge).

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (gurU dI d`sI jugq) nwl (vwihgurU dI) prm joq dw pRkwS jgwauˆdy hn, (Bwv joiq srUp prmwqmw dw irdy ivKy icMqn krdy hn)[

lines.gurmukhi: soiD ifTw bRhmMfu, lvY n lweIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: sodh ddittaa brahamandd, lavai na laae'eeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: Having seen the whole universe I have found that none reaches His grandeur.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ikauˆ jo aunHW ny swry) bRhmWf ivKy (soD) ivcwrky if`Tw hY, (ausdy smwn) hor koeI nhIˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: iqsu nwhI jm fMfu, srix smweIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: tis naahee jam ddandd, saraN samaae'eeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: He who has come to the shelter of the holy congregation has no longer the fear of death.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: AYsy (siqsMgI) nUM jm dMf nhIˆ hY, auh Srx (pRBU dI) ivc smwieAw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: Gor pwp kir KMfu, nrik n pweIAY [
lines.transliteration_english: ghor paap kar khandd, narak na paae'eeaai |

Vaaran English.translation: Even the horrible sins are decimated and one escapes going to the hell.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: aus dy Gor pwp KMfy jWdy hn, (auh) nrkW ivc nhIˆ pwieAw jWdw; (prMqU kUVy lok auQy nhIˆ itk skdy, idRStWq-ij`kur)

Vaaran English.translation: As the rice comes out of husk, similarly whosoever goes to the holy congregation gets liberated.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: cwvlW ivcoˆ vMf (C`itAW) au`Br Awauˆdy hn, qy k`Fy jWdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: There, homogenous truth prevails and falsehood remains far behind.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: AKMf s`c dy (Bwv siqsMg dy) ivcoˆ JUTy k`Fy jWdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Bravo to the Sikhs of Gum who have refined their lives.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: guris`KW nUM SwbwS hY (ijnHW ny Awpxw) jnm suvwr lIqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: The right living of the Sikhs of the Guru is that they love the Guru.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gur is`KW dw rsqw is`Dw hY (ik aunHW ny) gurU nUM pÎwr kIqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurumukhs remember the name of the Lord with every breath and every morsel.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuK (ho ky aunHW ny prmySr dy) nwm nUM sws igrws Xwd kIqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Epudiating pride they remain detached amidst maya.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: mwieAw ivc audws rihky hMkwr dUr kIqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurmukhs consider hemselves as the servant of the servants and service only is their true conduct.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: dwsW dy dws hoky gurmuKW ny syvw dw Blw kMm kIqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Pondering upon the Word, they remain neutral towards hopes.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: Awsw ivc (Pyr bI) inrws hI vrqngy Ar Sbd dI vIcwr krngy[

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK shij invwsu, mn hT mwirAw [
lines.transliteration_english: guramukh sahaj nivaas, man hatt maariaa |

Vaaran English.translation: Eschewing stubbornness of mind, gurmukhs reside in equipoise.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuKW dw invws sihj iv`c hovygw (iksy bwq ivc) hT mn ivc nhIˆ Dwrngy[

Vaaran English.translation: Enlightened of gurmukhs salvages many a fallen one.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuKW dy mn ivc (vwihgurU) dw prgws ho jweygw (Pyr aunHW Qoˆ) piqq auDwr pwauxgy[

Vaaran English.translation: Those gurmukhs are acclaimed who have found the true Guru.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurU dy isKW dI (ijnHW ny) siqgurU (gurU nwnk jI dw drSn) pwieAw hY, jX jX hovy[

Vaaran English.translation: Practising the Word, they have emancipated their whole families.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ikauˆ jo aunHW ny) gurU dw Sbd kmwky swry pirvwr dw auDwr kIqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurmukhs have the Will of God and they work according to the truth.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (ijnHW) gurmuKW nUM (Akwl purK dw) Bwxw im`Tw lgdw hY, (aunHW dI) krnI s`c dI ho geI hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Eschewing ego, they obtain the door of liberation.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuK mukqI dw vsIlw hn, (ikauˆik) Awpw Bwv gvw idqw hY, (ijs qrHW drvwjy ny Apny ivcoˆ kMD rUp haUmY k`Fky rwh KolH idqw huMdw hY qy fwt dy Awsry KVw hY)[

Vaaran English.translation: The gurmukhs have made the mind understand the principle of altruism.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuK praupkwr krdy hn, (ieho) mn nUM smJwauˆdy hn (ik inrws qy inSkwm rihky aupkwr kr)[

Vaaran English.translation: The base of gurmukhs is truth and they (finally) get absorbd into truth.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuK s`c dw AwSRX lYky s`c ivKy smw jWdy hn[

Vaaran English.translation: Gurmukhs are not scared of public opinion

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuKW nUM lok l`jw dw lyp nhIˆ lgdw (Bwv lok l`jw C`fky) BgvMq prwXx rihMdy hn[ AQvw p`CmI dyS ivKy lMkwr loeI dw vwck hY, ieQy Bwv ivc godVI dw ArQ lYˆdy hn ik gurmuKW dI godVI nUM lokk klMk nhIˆ lgdw)[

Vaaran English.translation: And this way they visualise that imperceptible Lord.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuKW nUM AlK (vwihgurU ny Awpxw) eykMkwr (srUp) lKw idqw hY[

Vaaran English.translation: Touching the philosopher's stone in the form of gurmukh all the eight metals transform into gold i.e. all the people become pure.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: gurmuKW dI joq cMdRRmW vq hY, (aus ivcoˆ) AMimRq (nwm) dI vrKw huMdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: Ast Dwqu iek Dwqu, pwrsu prsxw [
lines.transliteration_english: asaT dhaat eik dhaat, paaras parasaNaa |

Vaaran English.translation: Like the fragrance of sandal they permeate all the trees i.e. they adopt one and all as their own.

Vaaran Punjabi.translation: (Eh) pwrs (vW|U) prsky A`TW DwqW nUM iek Dwq (sonw kr idMdy hn)[

Vaaran English.translation: They are like Ganges in which all the rivers and rivulets merge and become full of vitality.
